turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to get some coffee from the Fort Gratiot Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a caffè mocha venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caffe mocha with whole milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks in fort gratiot, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you. can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be it for me. Thank you.
